dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,OD_SC_VEND_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_PHONE ,OD_SC_VEND_FAX ,OD_SC_VEND_EMAIL ,OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME ,OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,OD_SC_FACTORY_FAX ,OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_DEPARTMENT ,OD_SC_MERCHANT ,OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER_STATUS ,OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D ,OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,OD_SC_CIP ,OD_SC_PREAUDT_RESULT ,OD_SC_FZT_APRVL_D ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_REQ_D ,OD_SC_PAYMENT_RETAINER ,OD_PB_PAYRTN_APRVL_DATE ,OD_SC_VENDPAY_RCVD_D ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,/*CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE) < 0 THEN 'LATE' WHEN (SYSDATE - OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE) > 0 AND (SYSDATE - OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE) <= 30 THEN 'Within 30' WHEN (SYSDATE - OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE) > 30 AND (SYSDATE - OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE) <= 60 THEN 'Within 60' WHEN (SYSDATE - OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE) > 60 AND (SYSDATE - OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE) <= 90 THEN 'Within 90' WHEN (SYSDATE - OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE) > 90 THEN 'Above 90' END */ OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,OD_SC_INSPECTION_TYPE ,OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,OD_SC_PENDING_STATUS_CHANGE ,OD_SC_AUDIT_STATUS_NOTIFY ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO GSO_SUPPLIER_ID ,OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO GSO_FACTORY_ID ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS GSO_SUPPLIER_STATUS FROM (SELECT * FROM q_od_pb_sc_vendor_master_v WHERE (:P_PROFILE_VALUE in ('ODGLB','ODUS')) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_eu_vendor_master_v WHERE (:P_PROFILE_VALUE in ('ODGLB','ODEU')) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_mx_vendor_master_v WHERE (:P_PROFILE_VALUE in ('ODGLB','ODMX')) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_asia_vendor_master_v WHERE (:P_PROFILE_VALUE in ('ODGLB','ODASIA')) ) WHERE OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS = 'Active' AND OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D IS NULL AND (OD_SC_CIP IS NULL OR OD_SC_CIP = 'No') AND ((OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE-SYSDATE) BETWEEN 0 AND DECODE(:P_OPTIONS,'Within 30', 30 ,'Within 60', 60 ,'Within 90', 90,'LATE',0) OR (OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE-SYSDATE) <= DECODE(:P_OPTIONS,'LATE',0))
